name: World End Domination
description:
This game is a fan-game made for the Umineko Game Jam.

Ever since making my Umineko First Twilight 3D video I've been wanting to re-create the famous Rosa vs. Goats scene in 3D as well, because it is my favorite scene in the entire series. I hope you will enjoy my take on it!

There are two modes of play. In Story Mode, you will experience a faithful recreation of the original scene in 3D. In Survival Mode, you will take control of Rosa, and in the style of a first-person-shooter make your escape off the island!
